content.raw: My concern about the new bandwidth limitations is that they effectively prevent us from using ROS on the client side.  This means that everyone participating is going to write their own, proprietary message protocol to work within the bandwidth limitations.  Any new UIs or tiered autonomy work will use these message protocols that work only for a single team with a single robot.  For a challenge that could have developed new, useful tools in ROS, this is a disappointing limitation.
